item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (12 points | 3 comments)
2. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (48 points | 14 comments)
3. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (25 points | 14 comments)
4. Advent Of Code 2024 in Nix - Day 01-03 (6 points | no comments)
5. Breakage! in the Cargo.toml — How Rust Package Features Work (And Break) (6 points | no comments)
6. Alpine Linux 3.21 (9 points | 1 comment)
7. Structured binding upgrades in C++26 (14 points | 2 comments)
8. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (43 points | 21 comments)
9. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (6 points | 1 comment)
10. First impressions of the new Amazon Nova LLMs (via a new llm-bedrock plugin) (15 points | 7 comments)
11. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (3 points | no comments)
12. Compressed Random-Access Trees for Spatially Coherent Data (2007) (3 points | no comments)
13. Flightle – Web-based 2D sidescrolling flight simulator (1 points | no comments)
14. Egoless Engineering (84 points | 14 comments)
15. A complex bug with a ⸢simple⸣ fix (11 points | 14 comments)
16. You can’t get more adversarial than PvP MMORPGs (3 points | no comments)
17. The Cloud Container Iceberg (16 points | 4 comments)
18. A Brief Introduction to OCI Containers on FreeBSD (50 points | 19 comments)
19. What's up with Lobste.rs blocking the Brave browser? (16 points | 16 comments)
20. The Hoare Cube (15 points | no comments)
21. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir and Membrane (2 points | no comments)
22. The Tube Computer: wall-mounted 8-bit homebrew computer from vintage thermionic valves (32 points | 5 comments)
23. Full-stack quantum computing, from hardware to compilers and algorithms (6 points | 4 comments)
24. “This is Just a Prototype”: How Ethics Are Ignored in Software Startup-Like Environments (1 points | no comments)
25. AES-GCM and breaking it on nonce reuse (6 points | 1 comment)
